fields.fieldText: This Account does not have any Home Runs with enough Fiber Available to facilitate this connection. Please review the Fiber Pairs that need committing and if the issue persists, contact a system admin.

fields.name: ThereIsNoPanelTextError
fields.fieldText: This Account does not have any Panels in this Meet Me Room. Please check another Building and if the issue persists, go back to the Asset Allocation screen and Allocate a Panel for this Customer. Click Next to cancel the flow.
